Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government" During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He can be extremely proud of the role he has played, including for the last eight months in Government . On top of the spending freeze, Barack Obama also emphasized that he's open to even further cuts as long as "we're not doing it on the backs of our most vulnerable citizens."

Colin Powell , in a May 1990 interview with The Washington Post, revealed that he thought the deepest cuts the military could withstand in dollars and troops was 20 to 25 percent.
